description_text:
Hello, I bought SPRO-P3 pedals, but simsonn manager shows: This version is
too old to use. Can I upgrade controller software, so it will support this
program? How can i do it? On your website links to manuals are invalid and
return 404

conversations.body_text: Hi Des Caldnd,  You can upgrade to our latest software, SIMSONN Manager version 2.0.8. After launching the software, go to the settings menu and manually update the firmware by selecting the firmware-pedals-plus.sfu file. Once the upgrade is complete, you’ll be able to access the new configuration features in the updated software.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
